page.title: 06The Police.
page.content: Each{Police Constable}has his or her own warrant card which has the warrant holders signature and picture on it.On the other side there is a special mark with which you can unlock some doors. A{Policeman}is armed with a{truncheon} ({Policewomen}have a smaller one ) these are used only as a last resort. They also have a{pair of handcuffs } and a{personal radio.}A{Policeman}on{ {foot patrol}wears a{helmet}and a {Policeman}in a car wears a{cap} ({Policewomen}wear{bonnets}). In the summer a{Policeman}or a{Policewoman} might be permitted to take off his or her{jacket}and do their{patrol}in short sleeves. The main problem in Cornwall is with people taking drugs such as{cannabis}and{heroin}also there are a lot of people{gluesniffing.} { }
